CustomField.description: When checked, the Relay of this record will be preformed in its own "Execution Context". This provides the ability for the Relay Client to perform DML, but may impact performance.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, the Relay of this record will be preformed in its own "Execution Context". This provides the ability for the Relay Client to perform DML, but may impact performance.
CustomField.label: Isolate Relay
